title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 651.11 - State aid payments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 651.11 - State aid payments

State Regulations

All payments of State assistance shall be made to the
applicant with the stipulation that the applicant make prompt payment to the
contracting engineer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
651.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
